citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:00 am on
28-FEB-19.
I attempted to make first contact at facility on Feb 27, 2019, I then called and left a message that I was at the facility.
A second attempt was made on February 28, 2019, I left a message to return my call. Last attempt made March 1,
2019 at 10:45 am, I was unable to leave a voice message but was allowed to send a text of my phone number.
Please contact me with updated information of hours of availability.

narrative:
2.126(b)
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:00 am on
28-FEB-19.
I attempted to make first contact at facility on Feb 27, 2019, I then called and left a message that I was at the facility.
 A second attempt was made on February 28, 2019, I left a message to return my call.  Last attempt made March 1,
2019 at 10:45 am, I was unable to leave a voice message but was allowed to send a text of my phone number. 
Please contact me with updated information of hours of availability.
